long_description: Even if you get wet during a rainy bike commute, the VAUDE 45 messenger bike backpack keeps your gear bone-dry thanks to tough waterproof fabric and a rolltop closure. 45 liter capacity allows ample room for groceries, workout gear and whatever else you pick up along the way. Waterproof, polyamide-coated polyester offers druable protection; breathable, padded back panel ensures airflow and comfort. Adjustable shoulder straps; reflective elements. Closeout.
short_description: Even if you get wet during a rainy bike commute, the VAUDE 45 messenger bike backpack keeps your gear bone-dry thanks to tough waterproof fabric and a rolltop closure.
